synopsis.text: During spring break, second-year high school student Koyomi Araragi befriends the top student Tsubasa Hanekawa. She mentions rumors of a blonde vampire lurking around town. That night, Koyomi encounters the vampire - Kiss-Shot Acerola-Orion Heart-Under-Blade, the King of Apparitions. He finds her dismembered in a pool of blood and, at her urging, gives her his blood to save her. Immediately after, Koyomi awakens as Kiss-Shot's vampire subordinate. As he struggles with this shocking transformation, she welcomes him to the world of darkness.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
